basics.name: Shubham Mote
basics.label: Full-Stack Developer | React.js, Node.js, Python | 3.5+ Years of Experience in Scalable Web Applications | Delivered Enterprise Tools & Global-Facing Website
basics.summary: Full-Stack Developer with 3.5+ years of experience building scalable web applications. Delivered enterprise tools and global-facing websites using React.js, Node.js, and Python. Proven expertise in optimizing performance, reducing API latency, and implementing CI/CD pipelines.

work.summary: Developing robust backend services and responsive React.js UIs for enterprise tools. Migrated legacy systems to TypeScript and implemented centralized authentication systems.
highlights: Developed a robust backend service in NodeJS for the SOW Tracker, a critical tool for key stakeholders, handling high-volume API requests and reducing response times by 40%
Built responsive React.js UIs for enterprise tools (SOW Tracker, Screener, User Control), enhancing stakeholder usability
Migrated PharmaACE.com to TypeScript with React + Node.js, improving type safety, scalability, and SEO performance, which resulted in higher global traffic and accessibility
Built a centralized User Management system with JWT-based authentication and RBAC, enabling secure access across multiple applications
Rebuilt the corporate website using React.js and Node.js, optimized for SEO and cross-browser compatibility
Integrated Redux to enhance app state management and improve frontend responsiveness
Wrote unit tests with Jest, increasing code coverage and reducing deployment bugs
Automated CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions, streamlining deployments and improving release efficiency

work.summary: Engineered responsive UI components and built scalable backend APIs. Partnered with UI/UX teams to optimize app performance.
highlights: Engineered responsive UI components with React.js, Tailwind CSS, HTML5 and Material UI
Built scalable backend APIs in NodeJS/ExpressJS, ensuring robust data handling and performance
Partnered with UI/UX teams to optimize app performance, and reduce load times

work.summary: Managed a 15-member video team, gaining leadership, client delivery & management skills.
highlights: Gained leadership, client delivery & management skills

projects.name: SOW Tracker
projects.description: Enterprise-grade tool for managing Statements of Work
highlights: Reduced manual overhead and API latency by 40% for stakeholders

projects.name: Screener
projects.description: Candidate screening platform with interview scheduling
highlights: Integrated Microsoft APIs for automated interview scheduling, cutting manual coordination in high-volume hiring

projects.name: PharmaACE.com
projects.description: Rebuilt the company's primary website for a global audience
highlights: Improved SEO and scalability, resulting in higher traffic and better global accessibility
